sen.j: 観世元義（かんぜ もとよし、1873年 - 1920年）は、観世流能楽師。
sen.e: Motoyoshi KANZE (1873 to 1920) was a Noh actor of the Kanze school.
Motoyoshi KANZE (1873 to 1920) was a Noh actor of the Kanze school.
Motoyoshi KANZE (1873 to 1920) was a Noh actor of the Kanze school.
Second son of Kiyotaka KANZE, the 22nd head of the leading family in the Kanze school.

Kiyokado KANZE, the 23rd head of the leading family, is his older brother.

sen.j: 6代片山九郎右衛門と、3代井上八千代の娘・光子と結婚し、7代九郎右衛門を名乗り、その後片山九郎三郎。
sen.e: Marrying the daughter Mitsuko of the 6th Kuroemon KATAYAMA and the 3rd Yachiyo INOUE, he inherited the name as the 7th Kuroemon, and changed it to Kurosaburo KATAYAMA later.

sen.j: 長男が24代宗家観世元滋、次男が片山博通。
sen.e: Motoshige KANZE, the 24th head of the leading g family, is the first son, and Hiromichi KATAYAMA is the second son.
